title: Chi Onwurah – 2020 Comments on Business Loan Scheme Statistics
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chi Onwurah, the Shadow Science, Research and Digital Minister, on 11 August 2020.
content: It cannot be right that hundreds of thousands of businesses have been shut out of the support promised to them in this time of crisis. Ministers need to sort their system out and urgently accelerate access to support. Failure to do so risks the future of all these businesses, the bread and butter of Britain’s economy, as well as scores of livelihoods across the country.
